attributes.action: Create a totally independent and full audit of all government spending since 1997
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Create a totally independent and full audit of all government spending since 1997 so that the taxpayers of this country can finally see how their money has been wasted.
This audit would then shed light on why the government is constantly creating new ways to tax the population when all the while no services seem to improve.
